message:
Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

This is to inform you that an {{ issue_type }} was detected in your attendance on {{ frappe.utils.format_date(doc.attendance_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") or "" }}.

If you believe this is an error, please contact the HR department.


Regards,
HR Team
{{doc.company or ""}}
name: Attendance Issue Reminder
subject: Attendance Alert: {{ issue_type }} on {{frappe.utils.format_date( doc.attendance_date,"dd-MM-yyyy") }}
